strings.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, try to do the process again
strings.only_master_can_run: Only Bot Master can use this command
strings.only_admin_can_run: Only Administrators can use this command
strings.about_bot: ‚ùî About Bo¬≥+t is written in java and originally developed by @VegaZS ‚å® Developer/Maintainer of Bo¬≥+t VegaZS - Original dev Velosh - Unofficial maintainer of Bo¬≥+t for Treble Experience ‚ùï Build Info %1
strings.start: Hey there! How are you? üëã I was developed especially to serve as an automation for ErfanGSIs, I don't have many functions beyond that.
strings.unknown_lang: Language not available, type %1chlang to see available languages
strings.egsi_allow_by_reply: To add permissions, reply to user that you wanna add permissions, by using %1%2 allowuser
strings.egsi_supported_types: GSI Type or URL is not valid! Supported types on Android 11: %1 Supported types on Android 12: %2
strings.egsi_dont_exists_tool_folder: The ErfanGSIs tool folder does not exist.
strings.egsi_something_is_wrong: Something is wrong, check if you are using the updated ErfanGSIs tool.
strings.egsi_fail_to_build_gsi: Beep bop... the GSI process failed, check if something is wrong.
strings.xgsi_allow_by_reply: To add permissions, reply to user that you wanna add permissions, by using %1%2 allowuser
strings.xgsi_supported_types: SGSI Type or URL is not valid! Supported types on Android 12: %1
strings.xgsi_dont_exists_tool_folder: The XiaoxindadaSGSIs tool folder does not exist.
strings.xgsi_something_is_wrong: Something is wrong, check if you are using the updated XiaoxindadaSGSIs tool.
strings.xgsi_fail_to_build_gsi: Beep bop... the SGSI process failed, check if something is wrong.
strings.dgsi_allow_by_reply: To add permissions, reply to user that you wanna add permissions, by using %1%2 allowuser
strings.dgsi_dont_exists_tool_folder: The Debloat tool folder does not exist.
strings.dgsi_something_is_wrong: Something is wrong, check if you are using the updated Debloat tool.
strings.dgsi_fail_to_build_gsi: Beep bop... the GSI process failed, check something is wrong.
strings.chkey_help: Current bot hotkey on this chat: %1 Supported Hotkeys: %2
strings.chkey_error: Sorry, it is not possible to change, this hotkey is probably not compatible
strings.request_done: Hello %1 (%3) your request has been sent! Just wait now.
strings.info_not_shared: Information not shared by the user.
strings.invalid_link: Hello %1 (%3), the link you sent appears to be invalid! Use with http parameters and try again.
strings.cant_be_used: This bot cannot be used in other locations!
strings.issue_with_privatechat: Can't send request, the private chat variable does not exist or has no value.
strings.issue_with_publicchat: Can't send request, the public chat variable does not exist or has no value.
strings.issue_with_index_chat: The chat (public and private) variables must be used and implemented in the form of Bot API, check if it is correct.
strings.unable_to_create: It is impossible to create, as a SourceForge properties file already exists
strings.cant_run_shell: Sorry, the shell command is locked (Probably exists other shell command running).
